name: Splash Splash!
description:
Captain, take charge of your boat and lets clear the pool of ducks!

In this game, your objective is simple - clear out all the ducks! You'll get score for each duck you take out, try to get the highest score you can.

Avoid shooting the red ducks, they will drain your pool of water - if the pool is empty, the fun is also over. Red ducks explode after a set time on their own.

Green ducks will replenish your pool with more water :)
